articles.title: YouTube says its TikTok competitor is getting 3.5 billion views a day in India test run - CNBC
articles.description: YouTube CEO Susan Wojcicki says its short-form video feature Shorts will expand to more markets in 2021.
articles.content:
YouTube's short-form video feature Shorts, which aims to compete with TikTok, is achieving 3.5 billion views per day during its early test run in India, the company said Tuesday.

articles.title: IMF projects 11.5% growth rate for India in 2021, only economy to record double digit growth - Hindustan Times
articles.description: In its latest update, the IMF projected a 11.5 per cent growth rate for India in 2021. This makes India the only major economy of the world to register a double-digit growth in 2021, it said.
